description: Make a Christmas dessert to remember with this eye-catching red velvet Oreo cheesecake recipe. Vibrant, creamy and delicious, it's full of festive cheer.
name: Red Velvet Oreo Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer cheesecake to a serving plate. Top with berries and Flake to decorate. Serve.
